about_the_game:
One explosion and we're on our way! An action game with a new feel

The protagonist, AKAHO, has the ability to cause an explosion.
By hitting the explosion, she can move at great speed!
The game makes full use of these explosions to clear various stages.

A variety of stages and three routes you can take to and from

Stages vary from dodging enemy barrages, to moving fast incessantly, to carrying boxes in explosions, and more!
Furthermore, the game doesn't just clear stages in a straight line, some of the stages have branches inside, allowing you to go between three different routes!
You'll find something new every time you play!

I'm glad to be dead! A special kind of beaten performance

akaho is so poor that the slightest thing other than an explosion will kill her!
But there's a little bit of sexiness when she dies, so it's half as gruesome!
If you're tired of the game, you can enjoy looking at dead AKAHO!

Description of operation

keyboard
Left and right: movement
SPACE: Jump
Up, down, left and right while pressing the U button: adjust the explosion position.
Letting go of the U: Explosion

controller
Left and right: movement
A Button : jump
Up, down, left and right while pressing the right shoulder: adjust the explosion position
Right shoulder release: explosion

name: Impulse, From Here!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core™ Duo or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: "Impulse, From Here" is a 2D action game featuring unique aerial controls that allow you to blow yourself up in explosions as you progress! The stages are highly challenging and offer multiple routes, so there's replayability! Look at the way the cute girl gets beaten up badly!
supported_languages:
English, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
